DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate severity dry eye syndrome follow excimer laser vision correction use no-touch all-laser photorefractive keratectomy comparison conventional lasik
DOC.brief_title: Dry Eye Evaluation After Transepithelial PRK
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective interventional clinical study 2 group : Group A : 20 eye 10 patient undergoing transepithelial PRK Group B : 20 eye 10 patient undergoing LASIK use mechanical microkeratome Tear Break Up Time Schirmer 2 test use evaluate severity dry eye surgery 1 , 3 6 month postoperative Follow period : 6 month
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Myopia 1 6 diopter Astigmatism 0.5 4 diopter Pregnancy lactation Keratoconus Previous refractive surgery Previous herpetic keratitis
DOC.keyword: Dry eye advance surface ablation technique
